title: Cross-constraint basis theorems and products of partitions
authors: Julien Cervelle and William Gaudelier and Ludovic Levy Patey
abstract:
We both survey and extend a new technique from Lu Liu to prove separation
theorems between products of Ramsey-type theorems over computable reducibility.
We use this technique to show that Ramsey's theorem for $n$-tuples and three
colors is not computably reducible to finite products of Ramsey's theorem for
$n$-tuples and two colors.
